Note - If there is a discrepancy in at bats for White Sox players Cavarreta and Johnson, it could be here.  TSN and White Sox scoresheet have subs in the 8th as I entered them after McGhee was taken out of the game.  However, NY Times has Cavaretta hitting fourth and Johnson hitting ninth.  As you can see I went with TSN and the scoresheet.1954PHA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
